title: Couple With Heart Woman Man Light Skin Tone Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Woman and Man Holding Hands with Heart
description: Represents a romantic couple with a woman and a man, with specified skin tones and a heart symbol between them, symbolizing love and affection.
apple_vendor_description: The couple with heart emoji, featuring a woman with light skin tone and a man with medium-light skin tone, on Apple devices is a tender representation of a loving union.  The figures are rendered with Apple's characteristic soft, rounded edges and gentle 3D shading, creating a feeling of closeness and intimacy.  On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully communicates romantic love, partnership, and the joy of being together.
